SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT303
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an instructing party, eg, a fund manager, or its authorised representative, to an executing broker to instruct the allocation of either a block foreign exchange trade or a block currency option.
The MT 303 contains both the terms of the block trade and the individual allocations.
The executing party will reply by sending separate MT 300 Foreign Exchange Confirmations confirming each individual allocation.
The message may be sent to
a) cancel and amend the block trade and the complete set of allocations
b) amend a number of individual allocations.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMNA
Code.Description: Amends individual allocations contained in a previous instruction. Used to add settlement agents to a number of individual allocations contained in an MT 303 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in a number of individual allocations contained in an MT 303 previously sent.

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent instruction with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 303 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 303 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent instruction. Used to cancel an MT 303 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 303 which contains erroneous information

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates a previously sent instruction. Used to inform the receiver that an instruction has already been sent by telex, fax or SWIFT

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: New instruction. Used to send an instruction for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 303 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 303 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36) :
Indicator must contain one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: Option was sold by the fund manager, it receives the premium

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Option was bought by the fund manager, it pays the premium

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMM (Error code(s): T38) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Type must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: CURR
Code.Description: Price is expressed as an amount;the amount represents the premium amount.

Code.Name: PNTS
Code.Description: Price is expressed as points;the amount represents a number of points.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price is expressed as a percentage; the amount represents a percentage.

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on field 22A (Error code(s): C84):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on field 22A"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 Sequences B and C are mutually exclusive. Field 94A in sequence A specifies which type of transaction is allocated and thus which of the two sequences is present (Error code(s): C92):
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FORX", B.$size > 0 && C.$size == 0, Implies($value == "FXOP", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sequences B and C are mutually exclusive. Field 94A in sequence A specifies which type of transaction is allocated and thus which of the two sequences is present."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In sequence C, the presence of field 30X depends on field 23B (Error code(s): C95):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, the presence of field 30X depends on field 23B"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 The presence of sequence D depends on the value of field 22A in sequence A (Error code(s): C97):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence D depends on the value of field 22A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 In sequence D, subsequence D3, the presence of field 34B and subsequent party fields depends on field 94A of sequence A (Error code(s): C99):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D, subsequence D3, the presence of field 34B and subsequent party fields depends on field 94A of sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 303. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)(Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 303. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 will be separated by a four digit Reference Code. Reference Code is a number based on either field 36 in sequence B if field 94A in sequence A is FORX or field 36A in sequence C if field 94A in sequence A is FXOP. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 will be separated by a four digit Reference code.Reference Code is a number based on either field 36 in sequence B if field 94A in sequence A is FORX or field 36A in sequence C if field 94A in sequence A is FXOP. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled "

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]](Error code(s): T32).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-39P-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FC-39P-A If Type is CURR, the number of digits following the comma in Amount must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): D01).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Type is CURR, the number of digits following the comma in Amount must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-77D-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FC-77D-A One of the Codes /ICOM/ |/NONICOM/ | /VARICOM/ must be used (Error code(s): T47)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "One of the Codes /ICOM/ | /NONICOM/ | /VARICOM/ must be used"

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
